name: tms-desktop
description: TMS - Tiffin Management System Desktop Application
author: TMS Team

scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build
scripts.package:win: npm run build:all && electron-builder --win && echo Build completed successfully! Check dist-packages folder for output.
scripts.package:win:nsis: npm run build:all && electron-builder --win --x64 -c.win.target=nsis && echo NSIS installer build completed successfully! Check dist-packages folder.
scripts.package:win:portable: npm run build:all && electron-builder --win --x64 -c.win.target=portable && echo Portable build completed successfully! Check dist-packages folder.
scripts.package:win:fast: npm run build:all && electron-builder --win --x64 -c.win.target=portable -c.asar=false && echo Fast portable build completed successfully! Check dist-packages folder.
scripts.package:win:both: npm run build:all && electron-builder --win --x64 -c.win.target=nsis -c.win.target=portable && echo NSIS + Portable build completed successfully! Check dist-packages folder.
scripts.package:mac: npm run build:all && electron-builder --mac && echo macOS build completed successfully! Check dist-packages folder.
scripts.package:linux: npm run build:all && electron-builder --linux && echo Linux build completed successfully! Check dist-packages folder.
scripts.package:all: npm run build:all && electron-builder --win --mac --linux && echo All platform builds completed successfully! Check dist-packages folder.
